name: cursor-workshop
description: 3-hour workshop on using Cursor AI for app development

scripts.lab1:setup: mkdir -p my-api && cp labs/lab1-cursor-modes/starter/* my-api/ && echo '✅ Lab 1 setup complete! \nNext: Open my-api/ folder in Cursor (File → Open Folder)'
scripts.lab2:setup: mkdir -p my-rules-project && cp -r labs/lab2-rules-and-agents/starter/* my-rules-project/ 2>/dev/null || true && echo '✅ Lab 2 setup complete! \nNext: Open my-rules-project/ folder in Cursor'
scripts.lab3:setup: cp -r labs/lab3-production-refactoring/before my-refactor && echo '✅ Lab 3 setup complete! \nNext: Open my-refactor/ folder in Cursor'
scripts.lab4:setup: cp -r labs/lab4-realtime-notifications/before my-notifications && echo '✅ Lab 4 setup complete! \nNext: Open my-notifications/ folder in Cursor'
scripts.lab5:setup: cp -r labs/lab5-production-ready/before my-production && echo '✅ Lab 5 setup complete! \nNext: Open my-production/ folder in Cursor'
scripts.slides:all: npm run slides:pptx && npm run slides:pdf && npm run slides:html

author: Workshop Instructor
